parameters.name: ContactGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the alert contact group.

*   If you do not specify this parameter, an alert contact group is created.
*   If you specify this parameter, the specified alert contact group is modified.

parameters.name: ContactGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the alert contact group.

parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The ID of the contact that you want to add to the contact group. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).
